txt.en: 'Young hobbits today...skipping off all day! What they need is an honest day's work.'
'I'm busy working right now. Come back at supper if you want to talk.'
'Oh, the Master's son's gone missing, and it's got everyone worried. He was helping Frodo Baggins move back from Hobbiton.'
'I might go for a dip in the Brandywine when I'm done here, though it's getting a bit cold now.'
